original_title: MGM's March on in 1934-35 with Metro Goldwyn Mayer: Convention of the Century
overview: In 1934, MGM held a convention in Chicago, inviting its company distributors from all over the United States to preview the films scheduled for the 1934-1935 exhibition season. After a welcome from studio executive Felix E. Feist, the people in each geographic division are introduced, and the chief of each division says a few words.
title: MGM's March on in 1934-35 with Metro Goldwyn Mayer: Convention of the Century
